[[Image:Seal of the United States Supreme Court.svg|150px|right]]
The 2002 term of the [[Supreme Court of the United States]] began October 7, 2002 and concluded October 5, 2003. The table illustrates which opinion was filed by each justice in each case and which justices joined each opinion.<ref>One decree the Court included in its list of bench opinions for the term has been omitted: ''[[Kansas v. Nebraska]]'', 538 U.S. 720 (2003), a ''per curiam'' decree approving the parties' settlement.</ref>
